00039               I_ASSIGN(m_toolBarAreaAttrPtr, "ToolBarArea", "Specify the area for this toolbar\n 0 - left\n 1 - right\n 2 - top\n 3 - bottom", false, 0);
00040               I_ASSIGN(m_useVerticalOrientationAttrPtr, "UseVerticalOrientation", "Use vertical orientation of the tool bar", true, false);
00041               I_ASSIGN(m_dockFeaturesAttrPtr, "DockFeatures", "Specify the dock features for this widget\nIt is combination of options:\n1 - moveable\n 2 - floatable", true, DF_MOVEABLE | DF_FLOATABLE);
00042               I_ASSIGN(m_allowedDockAreasAttrPtr, "AllowedDockAreas", "Specify the allowed dock areas\nIt is combination of options:\n 1 - left\n 2 - right\n 4 - top\n 8 - bottom", false, 0);
00043               I_ASSIGN(m_titleAttrPtr, "Title", "Tool bar title", false, "");
00044               I_ASSIGN(m_iconSizeAttrPtr, "IconSize", "Size of the icon used in the tool bar", false, 32);
00045               I_ASSIGN(m_associatedDocumentTypeId, "AssociatedDocumentTypeId", "ID of the associated document type ID", false, "Default");
00046        I_END_COMPONENT;
00047
